issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tabbar disappears with different animations in different devices.
This is not regression since the issue occurs on 3.0.0 GA as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Install Kitchensink on iPhone3GS(v5.0.1) and iPhone5(v 6.0)
2. Go to BaseUI > Window(standalone) > Open tab w/o animation.

Actual: 
When click on open tab w/o animation on iPhone3GS, the tab bar disappears with bottom up animation whereas on iPhone5, tab bar disappears with slide animation.

Expected:
Same behavior should be observed on both devices.
fields.summary: IOS: TabbedBar - In Kitchensink,  tabbar disappears with different animations in different devices.

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
